price: O’dur size hayat veren sonra sizi öldürecek, sonra da yeniden diriltecek olan. Fakat insan çok nankördür
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحۡيَاكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُمَّ يُحۡيِيكُمۡۗ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَكَفُورٞ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī aḥyākum thumma yumītukum thumma yuḥ'yīkum inna al-insāna lakafūrun
translations: He will cause you to die
